content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System
- Steam engine at position (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at position (-4.5, 16.0) containing water
- Offshore pump at position (-3.5, 27.5) producing water
- Connected by pipe groups (fluid systems 4881, 4882, 4883, 4884, 4886)
- Electricity network (id 8626) connecting various poles

### Coal Mining Operation
- Burner mining drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing coal
- Burner inserter at position (41.5, -79.5) transferring coal

### Iron Production Line 1
- Burner mining drill at position (-28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden chest at position (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at position (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at position (-25.0, -59.0)
- Output chest at position (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates
- Burner inserter at position (-23.5, -58.5)

### Iron Production Line 2
- Burner mining drill at position (-18.0, -53.0)
- Wooden chest at position (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at position (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at position (-15.0, -51.0)
- Output chest at position (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates
- Burner inserter at position (-13.5, -50.5)

### Automation Science Pack Production
- Input chest at position (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at position (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine at position (8.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at position (11.5, 13.5)
- Stone furnace at position (14.0, 14.0)
- Connected by belt groups for material transport
- Lab for research at position (not specified)

ERROR TIPS

### Automation Science Pack Production Issues
- Ensure assembling machine has power supply before attempting production
- Verify copper plate supply is maintained in the input inventory
- Check if all required ingredients (copper plates and iron gear wheels) are available before production

### Resource Extraction Issues
- Maintain adequate fuel (coal) levels in mining drills and inserters
- Monitor output chests to prevent overflow or shortage of materials

### Power System Issues
- Keep boiler fueled with coal to maintain consistent power generation
- Ensure proper fluid connections between offshore pump, boiler, and steam engine
- Monitor steam engine status for "not receiving electricity" warnings

### Item Extraction Errors
- Verify items exist in the chest before attempting extraction
- Check if the chest position matches the expected coordinates for extraction
- Ensure proper chest connections and inserter placement for automated item movement
